meanings.definition: A person who murders a prominent figure for political or religious reasons.
meanings.sent1: The assassins plotted to eliminate the king.
meanings.sent2: The assassins were hired to take out the president.
meanings.sent3: The assassins tried to sneak up on the mayor but ended up scaring a cat instead.
meanings.sent4: The assassins' actions were like silent shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The image of the assassins lurking in the shadows haunted the town.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who carry out targeted killings for a specific cause.
meanings.sent1: The group of assassins carefully planned their next mission.
meanings.sent2: The assassins worked together to achieve their deadly goals.
meanings.sent3: The assassins held a secret meeting in a pizza parlor to discuss their next target.
meanings.sent4: The assassins' unity was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the assassins moving in unison was both chilling and mesmerizing.
